statements: UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='like', engagement_score=8.9 WHERE user_id=123 AND timestamp='2022-08-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE user_interactions SET engagement_score=6.7, interaction_type='comment' WHERE user_id=456 AND timestamp='2022-08-16 12:45:00';
UPDATE user_interactions SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', engagement_score = 9.2 WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2022-01-15'
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_duration = 30 WHERE user_id = 101 AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00';
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 8.5, timestamp = '2022-02-20' WHERE metric_id = 201;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 8.75, timestamp = '2022-01-20' WHERE metric_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Doe', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE course_id = 2;
